name: SalonPulse
overview:
SalonPulse.com is New York City’s most comprehensive guide to hair and beauty, and offers you access to ratings, reviews, and descriptions for NYC’s hair salons and barbershops.

SalonPulse.com provides a listing for all salons and barbershops located in NYC, where users can find reviews in detail for all services and latest hair experiences. Salon owners can update their profile information such as: locations, hours, prices, services, and any other relevant information.

SalonPulse.com helps NYC salons and barbershops attract customers through a loyalty platform, which enables salon and barbershop owners to offer incentives and generate reviews on SalonPulse.com. This loyalty platform helps to better manage customer retention and increase customer’s frequency of visits.
